mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_num, user_id, nickname, pwd, name, sex, birth, birth_hh, birth_mm, saju_year, saju_mon, saju_day, ilju, email, user_img, user_intro, user_mbti, user_height, user_loc, user_body) values(user_num_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{nickname}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{birth}, #{birth_hh}, #{birth_mm}, #{saju_year}, #{saju_mon}, #{saju_day}, #{ilju}, #{email}, #{user_img}, #{user_intro}, #{user_mbti}, #{user_height}, #{user_loc}, #{user_body})
mapper.select: select user_num from user_info where user_id=#{user_id}
select distinct ilju from sajuinfo where saju_year=#{saju_year} and saju_mon=#{saju_mon} and saju_day=#{saju_day}
select count(*) from user_info where user_id=#{id}
select count(*) from user_info where nickname=#{nickname}
select count(*) from user_info where email=#{email}
